roleset.name: gestate, carry offspring, enabling/ allowing to develop
roleset.note: GESTATE-V NOTES: Added by Kevin (from gestate.01-v)

example.name: From a google search, theme as subject
example.text: Some new spiritual idea was gestating in the womb of my mind.
example.arg: in the womb of my mind

example.name: Agent as subject, also from Google search
example.text: Last time I was gestating a baby, I didn't know a single other pregnant person.

example.name: Arg1
example.text: A miniature horse will obviously be on a much smaller scale but all horses develop in the same way; this article will walk you through the stages of gestation of the foal, whatever its final size.
